mapper.sql: CASE ROLE WHEN 'ROLE_USER' THEN 'USER' WHEN 'ROLE_GUEST' THEN 'GUEST' WHEN 'ROLE_ADMIN' THEN 'ADMIN' WHEN 'ROLE_MANAGER' THEN 'MANAGER' ELSE ROLE END AS role
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.NAME, M.ACCOUNT, M.PASSWORD, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE_NUMBER, M.PICTURE, M.BIRTH_DATE, M.USE_YN, M.CERT_YN, , M.CREATE_DATE, M.UPDATE_DATE, M.GENDER, SM.PROVIDER_TYPE AS REGISTRATIONID FROM MEMBER M JOIN SOCIAL_MEMBER SM ON M.MEMBER_ID = SM.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.EMAIL = #{email} AND SM.PROVIDER_TYPE = #{registrationId} AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.CERT_YN = 'Y'
